thread.title: Dallas surgeon jailed for life after killing 2 patients | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Dallas surgeon jailed for life after killing 2 patients | Daily Mail Online

author: Jordan Gass-Poore For Dailymail.Com
title: Dallas surgeon jailed for life after killing 2 patients | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Incompetent surgeon who killed two patients in botched ops, had a patient WAKE UP during surgery and paralyzed others is jailed for life Christopher Duntsch, 46, was the first doctor in Dallas County to be sentenced to life in prison for a surgery gone wrong Duntsch's attorneys argued he wasn't a criminal, just a lousy surgeon A number of alleged victims testified against him during his trial Court documents show a total of 34 people have made allegations against him Published: 00:56 GMT, 21 February 2017 | Updated: 07:41 GMT, 21 February 2017 55 shares
